p: Nevertheless, cytokines production by splenic mononuclear cells (MNCs) of the treated ovalbumin (OVA)-sensitized mice with N. sativa oil (252 mg, p.o.) were not significantly different from that of the non-treated group. These results indicated that N. sativa oil has no immune regulatory effect on Th 1 and Th 2 cell responsiveness to allergen stimulation (Büyüköztürk et al. 2005).
